HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: Introducing Advanced Transport Pods v2:| - This is a complete redesign of the original mod, rewritten with XML Extensions to support mod settings.| - The pod launcher and transport pods added by this mod have been reworked and rebalanced, and the most important values can be customized in the mod settings.| - All added research options, the new pod launcher, and individual pods can be enabled or disabled in the mod settings.| - Supports RimWorld versions 1.3 through 1.5. Support for older versions was dropped.

Updated for Rimworld 1.6.| - Can now be used in RW 1.6 and 1.5 also without XML Extensions, by dropping support for settings and just using default values.| - Settings have been omitted for RW 1.6, as XML Extensions does not support it at the time of this update.
Added a new XML Extensions schema which is shared between RW 1.5 and RW 1.6.| - Now supports mod settings via XML Extensions also in Rimworld 1.6. - Bug fixes etc
